author: nevermore_evermore
content: Hi, just for educational purpose: I am just wondering the original PoW Ethereum, does valid transactions from ommer blocks are also included, or are we just using its hashes?

author: ralexstokes
content: you can get rewarded for including valid ommer headers, but the bodies are not executed in any fashion

author: ralexstokes
content: if you came across ommers and they had transactions new to you and not yet included on chain they could go into future blocks
